item.description:
3DPAEC Course - 1.5 Hours of AIA Learning Credits

Architects, engineers, and designers will understand why 3D printing can help the entire design team become more efficient on a project and how 3D models improve the communication among the project stakeholders at various stages from design through construction.

Participants will also walk away with a basic understanding of the 3D printing technology, pros and cons, as well as workflows for various design systems.

Finally, participants will gain valuable skills in the actual creation of sample 3D models.
item.how_to_find_us: There is metered street parking, 8 minute walk from South Station and you can find the location here http://www.bing.com/maps/?v=2&where1=285%20Summer%20St%2C%20Boston%2C%20MA%2002210-1518&encType=1
item.name: 3D Printing AIA Presentation by Z Corp
